xyz.theprogramsrc.supercoreapi.global.storage

Interface DataBase

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MySQLDataBase, SQLiteDataBase

    public interface DataBase

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  DataBase.ConnectionCall
      Interface executed when a Connection is called

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeConnection()
      Closes the current connection with the DataBase
      void connect(DataBase.ConnectionCall call)
      Used to connect to the DataBase and execute a DataBase.ConnectionCall
      DataBaseSettings getDataBaseSettings()
      Gets the DataBase Settings
      boolean isLoaded()
      Checks if the DataBase is loaded (Recommended to use before executing anything)
      default boolean testConnection()
      Tests the current database connection by requesting the database name

    • Method Detail

      • getDataBaseSettings

        DataBaseSettings getDataBaseSettings()
        Gets the DataBase Settings
        Returns:
        DataBase Settings

      • isLoaded

        boolean isLoaded()
        Checks if the DataBase is loaded (Recommended to use before executing anything)
        Returns:
        If the DataBase is loaded or not

      • closeConnection

        void closeConnection()
        Closes the current connection with the DataBase

      • connect

        void connect(DataBase.ConnectionCall call)
        Used to connect to the DataBase and execute a DataBase.ConnectionCall
        Parameters:
        call - ConnectionCall to execute

      • testConnection

        default boolean testConnection()
        Tests the current database connection by requesting the database name
        Returns:
        true if the connection is successful, false otherwise
